title: Leadership Accelerator
description: Six-month mentorship program designed to help mid-career women develop leadership skills and advance to senior positions.

mentor.name: Sunita Rao
mentor.title: CTO, TechInnovate
mentor.bio: Sunita has 15+ years of experience in technology leadership roles and is passionate about helping women advance in tech careers.

eligibility: Women with 5+ years of experience in technology roles

title: Finance Career Pathways
description: Three-month program guiding women through career options in finance and providing personalized career planning.

mentor.name: Deepa Nair
mentor.title: VP Finance, GlobalBank
mentor.bio: Deepa has guided over 50 women to successful careers in finance through structured mentorship and network building.

eligibility: Women with interest in finance careers, including fresh graduates and career changers

title: Entrepreneurship Bootcamp
description: Intensive mentorship for women building their own startups, with guidance on business planning, funding, and market strategy.

mentor.name: Meena Shah
mentor.title: Founder & CEO, WomenFounders
mentor.bio: Meena has founded three successful startups and now dedicates her time to supporting women entrepreneurs across India.

eligibility: Women with a business idea or early-stage startup

title: Data Science Career Transition
description: Specialized mentorship for women looking to transition into data science roles, with personalized learning paths and projects.

mentor.name: Lakshmi Venkat
mentor.title: Lead Data Scientist, AnalyticsFirst
mentor.bio: Lakshmi transitioned from software development to data science and has helped dozens of women make similar successful career pivots.

eligibility: Women with programming background interested in data science careers

title: Work-Life Balance for Working Mothers
description: Supportive mentorship focused on strategies for maintaining career growth while balancing family responsibilities.

mentor.name: Rashmi Kumar
mentor.title: HR Director, FamilyFirst Corp
mentor.bio: Rashmi has advocated for family-friendly workplace policies and mentored hundreds of working mothers in maintaining thriving careers.

eligibility: Working mothers seeking support in career advancement
